name: MEC Downlink Trekking Poles - Unisex
description: Great trail support when you're loaded up on day hikes or multi-day epics. These adjustable hiking poles are just the ticket for rough trails, creek crossings and elevation drops. Compact enough to strap on your backpack when you don't need them.7075-T6 aluminum construction is light, durable and economical.3-section design fits on backpacks or in luggageAdjustable length 105-140cm.Twist-lock mechanism is easy to loosen or tighten.Soft polyurethane grips are durable yet comfortable, with an adjustable webbing loop.Mid-sized trekking basket reduces snagging, with a steel tip.
